properties.markdownProperty: It encapsulates requests as an object, which allows to parameterize clients with different requests, to have a queue or log of requests and to perform undo operations. This pattern has been implemented for all actions where the user modifies the project. The user chooses the action, the controller receives the request from the user interface, creates the command (object of the corresponding class according to the action that extends QUndoCommand) and executes it, saving it in the command stack. This allows the user to perform undo and redo actions.
